Name: Beginnings and Endings
Description:
| Earn credit with the Wheel 
| by helping before or after an adventure

Name: Naturalist
Description:
| Get help from the Wheel to craft 
| alchemical items and potions faster

Name: Worldly Mentor
Description: Help low-level PCs at your table

Name: Heroic Resurgence *
Description:
| Gain bonuses when using hero points 
| to return from the edge of death
